column1: Amozoc de Mota is a city located in Puebla
column2: Mexico.  Its borders are in the north
column3: the Malintzin volcano; in the south
column4: the "Sierra de Amozoc"; in the west
column5: the Acajete municipal seat; and in the west
column6: the capital of the State Puebla city. Amozoc city is the seventh largest in the State

column2: it has gained international relevance because it is the home of the Autódromo Miguel E. Abed
column3: which hosts a World Touring Car Championship event.
